verses.verse: And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> set forward <S%H5265><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and pitched <S%H2583><s%> <S%H8799><s%> in the plains <S%H6160><s%> of Moab <S%H4124><s%> on this side <S%H5676><s%> Yarden <S%H3383><s%> by Yericho <S%H3405><s%>.

And Balak <S%H1111><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Zippor <S%H6834><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8799><s%> all that Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> had done <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> to the Amorites <S%H567><s%>.

And Moab <S%H4124><s%> was sore <S%H3966><s%> afraid <S%H1481><s%> <S%H8799><s%> of <S%H6440><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%>, because they were many <S%H7227><s%>: and Moab <S%H4124><s%> was distressed <S%H6973><s%> <S%H8799><s%> because of <S%H6440><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>.

And Moab <S%H4124><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto the elders <S%H2205><s%> of Midian <S%H4080><s%>, Now shall this company <S%H6951><s%> lick up <S%H3897><s%> <S%H8762><s%> all that are round about <S%H5439><s%> us, as the ox <S%H7794><s%> licketh up <S%H3897><s%> <S%H8800><s%> the grass <S%H3418><s%> of the field <S%H7704><s%>. And Balak <S%H1111><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Zippor <S%H6834><s%> was king <S%H4428><s%> of the Moabites <S%H4124><s%> at that time <S%H6256><s%>.

He sent <S%H7971><s%> <S%H8799><s%> messengers <S%H4397><s%> therefore unto Balaam <S%H1109><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Beor <S%H1160><s%> to Pethor <S%H6604><s%>, which is by the river <S%H5104><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of his people <S%H5971><s%>, to call <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8800><s%> him, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, Behold, there is a people <S%H5971><s%> come out <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8804><s%> from Egypt <S%H4714><s%>: behold, they cover <S%H3680><s%> <S%H8765><s%> the face <S%H5869><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%>, and they abide <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8802><s%> over against <S%H4136><s%> me:

Come <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8798><s%> now therefore, I pray thee, curse <S%H779><s%> <S%H8798><s%> me this people <S%H5971><s%>; for they are too mighty <S%H6099><s%> for me: peradventure I shall prevail <S%H3201><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, that we may smite <S%H5221><s%> <S%H8686><s%> them, and that I may drive them out <S%H1644><s%> <S%H8762><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%>: for I wot <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8804><s%> that he whom thou blessest <S%H1288><s%> <S%H8762><s%> is blessed <S%H1288><s%> <S%H8794><s%>, and he whom thou cursest <S%H779><s%> <S%H8799><s%> is cursed <S%H779><s%> <S%H8714><s%>.

And the elders <S%H2205><s%> of Moab <S%H4124><s%> and the elders <S%H2205><s%> of Midian <S%H4080><s%> departed <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%> with the rewards of divination <S%H7081><s%> in their hand <S%H3027><s%>; and they came <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto Balaam <S%H1109><s%>, and spake <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8762><s%> unto him the words <S%H1697><s%> of Balak <S%H1111><s%>.

And he said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto them, Lodge <S%H3885><s%> <S%H8798><s%> here this night <S%H3915><s%>, and I will bring <S%H7725><s%> you word <S%H1697><s%> again <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8689><s%>, as the YY <S%H3068><s%> shall speak <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8762><s%> unto me: and the princes <S%H8269><s%> of Moab <S%H4124><s%> abode <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8799><s%> with Balaam <S%H1109><s%>.
And 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> came <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto Balaam <S%H1109><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, What men <S%H582><s%> are these with thee?

And Balaam <S%H1109><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>, Balak <S%H1111><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Zippor <S%H6834><s%>, king <S%H4428><s%> of Moab <S%H4124><s%>, hath sent <S%H7971><s%> <S%H8804><s%> unto me, saying,

Behold, there is a people <S%H5971><s%> come out <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8802><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, which covereth <S%H3680><s%> <S%H8762><s%> the face <S%H5869><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%>: come <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8798><s%> now, curse <S%H6895><s%> <S%H8798><s%> me them; peradventure I shall be able <S%H3201><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to overcome <S%H3898><s%> <S%H8736><s%> them, and drive them out <S%H1644><s%> <S%H8765><s%>.

And 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto Balaam <S%H1109><s%>, Thou shalt not go <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%> with them; thou shalt not curse <S%H779><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%>: for they are blessed <S%H1288><s%> <S%H8803><s%>.

And Balaam <S%H1109><s%> rose up <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8799><s%> in the morning <S%H1242><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto the princes <S%H8269><s%> of Balak <S%H1111><s%>, Get <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8798><s%> you into your land <S%H776><s%>: for the YY <S%H3068><s%> refuseht <S%H3985><s%> <S%H8765><s%> to give me leave <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8800><s%> to go <S%H1980><s%> <S%H8800><s%> with you.

And the princes <S%H8269><s%> of Moab <S%H4124><s%> rose up <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and they went <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto Balak <S%H1111><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, Balaam <S%H1109><s%> refuseht <S%H3985><s%> <S%H8765><s%> to come <S%H1980><s%> <S%H8800><s%> with us.
And Balak <S%H1111><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> <S%H8800><s%> yet again <S%H3254><s%> <S%H8686><s%> princes <S%H8269><s%>, more <S%H7227><s%>, and more honourable <S%H3513><s%> <S%H8737><s%> than they.

And they came <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to Balaam <S%H1109><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to him, Thus saith <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> Balak <S%H1111><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Zippor <S%H6834><s%>, Let nothing, I pray thee, hinder <S%H4513><s%> <S%H8735><s%> thee from coming <S%H1980><s%> <S%H8800><s%> unto me:

For I will promote <S%H3513><s%> thee unto very <S%H3966><s%> great <S%H3513><s%> <S%H8763><s%> honour <S%H3513><s%> <S%H8762><s%>, and I will do <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> whatsoever thou sayest <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto me: come <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8798><s%> therefore, I pray thee, curse <S%H6895><s%> <S%H8798><s%> me this people <S%H5971><s%>.

And Balaam <S%H1109><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> <S%H8799><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto the servants <S%H5650><s%> of Balak <S%H1111><s%>, If Balak <S%H1111><s%> would give <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8799><s%> me his house <S%H1004><s%> full <S%H4393><s%> of silver <S%H3701><s%> and gold <S%H2091><s%>, I cannot <S%H3201><s%> <S%H8799><s%> go beyond <S%H5674><s%> <S%H8800><s%> the word <S%H6310><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> my 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>, to do <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8800><s%> less <S%H6996><s%> or more <S%H1419><s%>.

Now therefore, I pray you, tarry <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8798><s%> ye also here this night <S%H3915><s%>, that I may know <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8799><s%> what the YY <S%H3068><s%> will say <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8763><s%> unto me more <S%H3254><s%> <S%H8686><s%>.

And 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> came <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto Balaam <S%H1109><s%> at night <S%H3915><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto him, If the men <S%H582><s%> come <S%H935><s%> <S%H8804><s%> to call <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8800><s%> thee, rise up <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8798><s%>, and go <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8798><s%> with them; but yet <S%H389><s%> the word <S%H1697><s%> which I shall say <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8762><s%> unto thee, that shalt thou do <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.

And Balaam <S%H1109><s%> rose up <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8799><s%> in the morning <S%H1242><s%>, and saddled <S%H2280><s%> <S%H8799><s%> his ass <S%H860><s%>, and went <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%> with the princes <S%H8269><s%> of Moab <S%H4124><s%>.

And 'Elohim's <S%H430><s%> anger <S%H639><s%> was kindled <S%H2734><s%> <S%H8799><s%> because he went <S%H1980><s%> <S%H8802><s%>: and the angel <S%H4397><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> stood <S%H3320><s%> <S%H8691><s%> in the way <S%H1870><s%> for an adversary <S%H7854><s%> against him. Now he was riding <S%H7392><s%> <S%H8802><s%> upon his ass <S%H860><s%>, and his two <S%H8147><s%> servants <S%H5288><s%> were with him.

And the ass <S%H860><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the angel <S%H4397><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> standing <S%H5324><s%> <S%H8737><s%> in the way <S%H1870><s%>, and his sword <S%H2719><s%> drawn <S%H8025><s%> <S%H8803><s%> in his hand <S%H3027><s%>: and the ass <S%H860><s%> turned aside <S%H5186><s%> <S%H8799><s%> out of the way <S%H1870><s%>, and went <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%> into the field <S%H7704><s%>: and Balaam <S%H1109><s%> smote <S%H5221><s%> <S%H8686><s%> the ass <S%H860><s%>, to turn <S%H5186><s%> <S%H8687><s%> her into the way <S%H1870><s%>.

But the angel <S%H4397><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> stood <S%H5975><s%> <S%H8799><s%> in a path <S%H4934><s%> of the vineyards <S%H3754><s%>, a wall <S%H1447><s%> being on this side, and a wall <S%H1447><s%> on that side.

And when the ass <S%H860><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the angel <S%H4397><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%>, she thrust <S%H3905><s%> <S%H8735><s%> herself unto the wall <S%H7023><s%>, and crushed <S%H3905><s%> <S%H8799><s%> Balaam's <S%H1109><s%> foot <S%H7272><s%> against the wall <S%H7023><s%>: and he smote <S%H5221><s%> <S%H8687><s%> her again <S%H3254><s%> <S%H8686><s%>.

And the angel <S%H4397><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> went <S%H5674><s%> <S%H8800><s%> further <S%H3254><s%> <S%H8686><s%>, and stood <S%H5975><s%> <S%H8799><s%> in a narrow <S%H6862><s%> place <S%H4725><s%>, where was no way <S%H1870><s%> to turn <S%H5186><s%> <S%H8800><s%> either to the right hand <S%H3225><s%> or to the left <S%H8040><s%>.

And when the ass <S%H860><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the angel <S%H4397><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%>, she fell down <S%H7257><s%> <S%H8799><s%> under Balaam <S%H1109><s%>: and Balaam's <S%H1109><s%> anger <S%H639><s%> was kindled <S%H2734><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and he smote <S%H5221><s%> <S%H8686><s%> the ass <S%H860><s%> with a staff <S%H4731><s%>.

And the YY <S%H3068><s%> opened <S%H6605><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the mouth <S%H6310><s%> of the ass <S%H860><s%>, and she said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto Balaam <S%H1109><s%>, What have I done <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> unto thee, that thou hast smitten <S%H5221><s%> <S%H8689><s%> me these three <S%H7969><s%> times <S%H7272><s%> ?

And Balaam <S%H1109><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto the ass <S%H860><s%>, Because thou hast mocked <S%H5953><s%> <S%H8694><s%> me: I would <S%H3863><s%> there were <S%H3426><s%> a sword <S%H2719><s%> in mine hand <S%H3027><s%>, for now would I kill <S%H2026><s%> <S%H8804><s%> thee.

And the ass <S%H860><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto Balaam <S%H1109><s%>, Am not I thine ass <S%H860><s%>, upon which thou hast ridden <S%H7392><s%> <S%H8804><s%> ever since I was thine unto this day <S%H3117><s%>? was I ever <S%H5532><s%> <S%H8687><s%> wont <S%H5532><s%> <S%H8689><s%> to do so <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8800><s%> unto thee? And he said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, Nay.

Then the YY <S%H3068><s%> opened <S%H1540><s%> <S%H8762><s%> the eyes <S%H5869><s%> of Balaam <S%H1109><s%>, and he saw <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the angel <S%H4397><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> standing <S%H5324><s%> <S%H8737><s%> in the way <S%H1870><s%>, and his sword <S%H2719><s%> drawn <S%H8025><s%> <S%H8803><s%> in his hand <S%H3027><s%>: and he bowed down <S%H6915><s%> <S%H8799><s%> his head, and fell flat <S%H7812><s%> <S%H8691><s%> on his face <S%H639><s%>.

And the angel <S%H4397><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto him, Wherefore hast thou smitten <S%H5221><s%> <S%H8689><s%> thine ass <S%H860><s%> these three <S%H7969><s%> times <S%H7272><s%>? behold, I went out <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8804><s%> to withstand <S%H7854><s%> thee, because thy way <S%H1870><s%> is perverse <S%H3399><s%> <S%H8804><s%> before me:

And the ass <S%H860><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8799><s%> me, and turned <S%H5186><s%> <S%H8799><s%> from me <S%H6440><s%> these three <S%H7969><s%> times <S%H7272><s%>: unless <S%H194><s%> she had turned <S%H5186><s%> <S%H8804><s%> from me <S%H6440><s%>, surely now also I had slain <S%H2026><s%> <S%H8804><s%> thee, and saved her alive <S%H2421><s%> <S%H8689><s%>.

And Balaam <S%H1109><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto the angel <S%H4397><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%>, I have sinned <S%H2398><s%> <S%H8804><s%>; for I knew <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8804><s%> not that thou stoodest <S%H5324><s%> <S%H8737><s%> in the way <S%H1870><s%> against <S%H7125><s%> <S%H8800><s%> me: now therefore, if it displease thee <S%H7489><s%> <S%H8804><s%> <S%H5869><s%>, I will get me back again <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.

And the angel <S%H4397><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto Balaam <S%H1109><s%>, Go <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8798><s%> with the men <S%H582><s%>: but only <S%H657><s%> the word <S%H1697><s%> that I shall speak <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8762><s%> unto thee, that thou shalt speak <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8762><s%>. So Balaam <S%H1109><s%> went <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%> with the princes <S%H8269><s%> of Balak <S%H1111><s%>.

And when Balak <S%H1111><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8799><s%> that Balaam <S%H1109><s%> was come <S%H935><s%> <S%H8802><s%>, he went out <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to meet <S%H7125><s%> <S%H8800><s%> him unto a city <S%H5892><s%> of Moab <S%H4124><s%>, which is in the border <S%H1366><s%> of Arnon <S%H769><s%>, which is in the utmost <S%H7097><s%> coast <S%H1366><s%>.

And Balak <S%H1111><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto Balaam <S%H1109><s%>, Did I not earnestly <S%H7971><s%> <S%H8800><s%> send <S%H7971><s%> <S%H8804><s%> unto thee to call <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8800><s%> thee? wherefore camest <S%H1980><s%> <S%H8804><s%> thou not unto me? am I not able <S%H3201><s%> <S%H8799><s%> indeed <S%H552><s%> to promote thee to honour <S%H3513><s%> <S%H8763><s%> ?

And Balaam <S%H1109><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto Balak <S%H1111><s%>, Lo, I am come <S%H935><s%> <S%H8804><s%> unto thee: have I now any power <S%H3201><s%> <S%H8799><s%> at all <S%H3201><s%> <S%H8800><s%> to say <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8763><s%> any thing <S%H3972><s%>? the word <S%H1697><s%> that 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> putteth <S%H7760><s%> <S%H8799><s%> in my mouth <S%H6310><s%>, that shall I speak <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8762><s%>.
And Balaam <S%H1109><s%> went <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%> with Balak <S%H1111><s%>, and they came <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto Kirjathhuzoth <S%H2351><s%> <S%H7155><s%>.

And Balak <S%H1111><s%> offered <S%H2076><s%> <S%H8799><s%> oxen <S%H1241><s%> and sheep <S%H6629><s%>, and sent <S%H7971><s%> <S%H8762><s%> to Balaam <S%H1109><s%>, and to the princes <S%H8269><s%> that were with him.

And it came to pass on the morrow <S%H1242><s%>, that Balak <S%H1111><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8799><s%> Balaam <S%H1109><s%>, and brought him up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8686><s%> into the high places <S%H1116><s%> of Baal <S%H1120><s%>, that thence he might see <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the utmost <S%H7097><s%> part of the people <S%H5971><s%>.
